*I shall come back with a heart of my enemy!*

* Goes to a hospital *

I'm looking for the heart of a one "Henry G. Enemy"

"Here you go sir, he passed away a few month's back"

Ahhh, that's unfortunate.

"May I ask sir, what are you going to do with his he-He's gone...."

*I HAVE TOOK THE HEART OF MY ENEMY! AND READY TO EAT!*
